function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Airborne transmission of SARS-CoV-2","Impact":"Increased risk of widespread transmission","Mitigation":"Improving ventilation and air filtration systems","Technologies":"HEPA filters, UV-C lights","People":"Building occupants, public","Owner":"HVAC engineers, building owners"},{"Description":"Misinterpretation of guidelines","Impact":"Implementation of incorrect countermeasures","Mitigation":"Clear communication and training on guidelines","Technologies":"None specified","People":"HVAC engineers, building maintenance staff","Owner":"Health organizations, ASHRAE"},{"Description":"Deprioritization of HVAC measures","Impact":"Reduced effectiveness in controlling spread","Mitigation":"Emphasizing the importance of HVAC measures in conjunction with other hygiene strategies","Technologies":"None specified","People":"Building occupants, public","Owner":"HVAC engineers, building owners"}]}
